TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: Palzbum App gives you offline access to your palz photo album.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_TITLE: How to use the Palzbum App
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Create account with palzbum.com, join a group with your pals. Then, this app will guild you all the way to sync your group data.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: Need help? Check out the tutorial available at palzbum.com
